TopicTitle: How do i make a part that a kerbal on EVA can use to control a craft?

Articles.Content:
I have not been on the forum for a loooooong time but now i am  making a new mod and i don't know how to make a certain part. 

I need to make a part for a kerbal on EVA and that with that part a kerbal could control a craft within a certain range. I would use the kerbal inventory system. I have already designed the part but now i am stuck on the coding bit.

Any help would be much apreciated.

Edited November 19, 2017 by Jeb-head-mug kerman
I don't know much about plugins but, that sounds like just putting a remote and antenna on said ship would accomplish the goal just as well.

It looks like you need the prob Control point enabled on your remote. With 1 Pilot defined as single hop only.

As i am rusty on programming i would advise that you look in modes that have own CommandPods to see how it will be defined for a part?

I dont really understand. I have already designed the part but it currently does nothing. I just need the code to make it control other ships. The procedure should be something like this: i lanch a plane next to the runway. I get a kerbal to go on EVA near the plane. The kerbal gets the remote control and using KIS. I press shift while still with the kerbal. I have control of the plane while on EVA. So thats how kt should go.
